name: Alan T. BROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of July, 2007, the Application for Relief filed June 27, 2007, is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

941 A.2d 1255
Alan T. BROOKS, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
